logLevel.name: Log Level
logLevel.hint: Set the logging level for the module, mate

choices.debug: Debug — Show every bloody log message, the whole lot
choices.info: Info — Show the important stuff and above (chuck out debug)
choices.warn: Warning — Only the dodgy bits and errors
choices.error: Error — Just when things go pear-shaped
choices.fatal: Fatal — Only when it's properly cactus
choices.none: None — She'll be right, no logging

tokenBorderIndicator.name: Token Border Indicator
tokenBorderIndicator.hint: Foundry's default outline around your tokens, cobber.

tokenDefaultVerticalHeight.name: Default Token Height
tokenDefaultVerticalHeight.hint: Default vertical height of a human‑sized creature.

verticalHeight.label: Vertical Height
verticalHeight.hint: How tall your token is from bottom to top, in scene units ({units}).

toggleOverlay.name: Toggle Movement Overlays
toggleOverlay.hint: Chuck this down to suss out how far you can leg it. Release and she's gone.

meleeWeaponRangeOverride.name: Melee Weapon Range Override
meleeWeaponRangeOverride.hint: When your weapon's reach is bang on the "grid" distance, swap it for this value instead.
